Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2024
Author: Michelle Hansen
Title: Stylish and functional jewelry box
Body: This jewelry box is so cute, great quality and holds everything that I need to hold. Exactly what I was looking for!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2024
Author: Robert
Title: Pink perfection!
Body: Buy the soft beautiful pink!  Gorgeous!  I love that the drawers completely pull out so you can prioritize the sections based on your needs plus it allows you to maximize the back spaces. I love that the top is glass not plastic which adds to the nice quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
Author: Declan DeSee
Title: Beautiful and so well made!
Body: I absolutely love this jewelry box!  It looks so luxurious and feels upscale. I have a lot of jewelry so I love being able to categorize my pieces into the different sections.  I definitely plan on purchasing more!

Date: Reviewed in Brazil on September 18, 2024
Author: Sarah :B
Title: Lindo
Body: Achei de ótima qualidade. Queria ter comprado o de 4 gavetas porém estava muito caro. O de 4 gavetas está por 741 reais e o de 3 gavetas 260. Chegou bem embalado.  Não é vidro porém é um acrilico de ótima qualidade,  o material é perfeito. Apaixonada

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2024
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Beautiful, Functional, Elegant Jewelry Box
Body: If I could give this product more than 5 stars, I would, it's that beautiful and well made.  I could not be happier with my purchase.  This jewelry box is exactly what I was looking for.  The quality and craftsmanship is evident the minute you open the package!  The drawers slide out smoothly and the variety of spaces is perfect for all the different earrings that I have.  The top section, which is advertised for rings, is actually perfect for all my small post earrings and I can see them through the glass top.  It was so well designed, it's like they read my mind.  If you're reading this review, yes, buy it, you won't regret it!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2024
Author: Tallie Spencer
Title: Great quality, fits all of my jewelry nicely!
Body: In love with this jewelery box! Makes my room feel so neat and organized and most importantly my jewelry doesn’t look a mess.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2024
Author: Yvette Monteon
Title: Surprised at the amazing quality
Body: I loved everything about this product. I need to use this product for gifts!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2024
Author: Lkc
Title: Beautiful & spacious
Body: I love this jewelry box! It’s not only beautiful but each drawer is well designed to fit many different types of jewelry. I got the four drawer one and I love it. Just ordered another one so I have some extra space, I think they will look nice on either side of my dresser

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2024
Author: annmariebaker
Title: Functional and cute organizer
Body: Love the different slots and compartments to store things in. All of the drawers slide out easily. Wish the bottom section had some dividers instead of being just one large drawer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2024
Author: Nancy S. Bass
Title: Very Nice
Body: It looks beautiful. I did not unbox it all the way. It is a Christmas present for my grand daughter . It is perfect for a big girl jewelry box that will be appropriate as she grows up.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2024
Author: Anna Williams
Title: Gorgeous and spacious
Body: This is the perfect jewelry box. I wanted to downsize from a standing mirror armoire and it fit literally everything! So nice.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2024
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Cute!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
Author: Kelsey
Title: Luxurious down to every last detail!
Body: I’ve purchased pieces from here before and the luxurious quality keeps me coming back. The exterior is smooth and well constructed. The liner keeps my jewelry in place and cushions it nicely. I appreciate the different compartments and spaces making it easy to fit all my pieces of jewelry with room to spare. Highly recommend!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2024
Author: Rachel
Title: Incredible quality! Very impressed!
Body: Upon reading the inside notecard provided by the company, I found that it’s made of leather! Not what I was expecting, but a very nice touch! They put protective wrapping on the gold handles and packaged it nicely so it wouldn’t get damaged, as the top is glass. Nice size and has a little weight to it!First drawer is what you see in the images, second is some rows for necklace or small watches and the third is empty for larger pieces! Came with a nice card with a spot for a gift card and a thank-you note as well as a care card for the leather from the company! (Perfect if you’re buying as a gift for someone!) You can tell they put a lot of effort into thanking their customers!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2024
Author: Kristi Crafton
Title: Great quality
Body: This was great quality for the pricing. It is sturdy and cute to have out on the dresser. Holds multiple pieces of jewelry, with perfect organization. Very functional.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2024
Author: LGT
Title: Stunning
Body: Sturdy piece, well made , beautiful design and aesthetic look.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2024
Author: maryam
Title: Great Jewelry Box!
Body: This 5 layer Jewelry box has great quality, lots of spaces and beautiful. I love it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2024
Author: Jaden
Body: LOVE THIS JEWELRY BOX. looks so elegant and holds so much!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
Author: Angela P
Title: Nice..but had a dent
Body: I ordered this jewelry box because I had finally collected enough jewelry to warrant one. It arrived securely packaged, but unfortunately after taking it out of the box I noticed a dent on the top drawer. I was hoping I would be able to push it out so it wasn’t so noticeable but unfortunately I didn’t have any luck. The box itself feels quite sturdy, it’s much heavier than I imagined. I like that it has a large amount of storage and a see through top for convenience. I know this dent might not bother some however, due to the price I just expected more. I can only assume that this dent occurred prior to packaging for how well it was packaged.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
Author: Candice C
Title: Nice size jewelry box
Body: This is a nice-sized jewelry box with 3 fully lined drawers. It holds a decent amount of jewelry without taking up much space. It also has a nice weight to it and feels well-made. The gold accents are a nice touch. One minor problem, it's an eggshell white. It's still a pretty box, but it appeared more white in the photos if you're getting it to match white furniture.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Author: Anthony A
Title: Not for necklaces
Body: The jewelry box is perfect for bracelet and rings and earrings but for necklaces the storage is poor designed. Plenty of room for everything but necklaces.

Title: Pretty but low quality
Body: Very pretty and functional but the material seems cheap and easily bendable. Arrived damaged at the corners

I purchased the “white” one but it arrived and the color is so much darker than pictured…it’s giving cream but like yellow cream. It stands out like a sore thumb since my decor is all very white.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2024
Author: JLO
Title: Amazing little Jewelry Box!
Body: I was surprised at how nice this jewelry box was for the cost.  I love that the drawers are interchangeable.  Often people don't want to display expensive rings in the glass.  No problem, the top drawer can be moved to any other location.  Very versatile and attractive too!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2024
Author: Timothy G. Lenker
Title: Perfect sized jewelry box
Body: The product looks just like images online. I bought the jewelry box with three shelves, it fits all of my jewelry comfortably and in an organized manner. I am satisfied with this purchase, it looks minimal and classy. I would recommend a four shelf box if you have a lot of jewelry.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2024
Author: Cherylee
Title: I just love the quality.  It sits beautifully on my dresser
Body: I just love the cream color of the jewelry box.  The draws slide in and out so smoothly.  Plenty of room to store all your finest pieces.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Author: Catherine Chang
Title: Excellent
Body: This is my third Vlando purchase and I am very satisfied with the organizers. The glass is a nice touch and everything will be kept dust free. My watches fit perfectly in the third drawer and I like the individual compartments in the second drawer to store necklaces and bracelets. The quality and finish is really nice, as well as the packaging and presentation.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2024
Author: afrorazz
Title: Cute & Functional But Not The Best Quality
Body: A cute little jewelry box with nice gold hardware on the drawers. When this arrived the dividers were really crooked but it is an easy fix. It is a nice size and can be stacked. Overall I like it and it serves to organize my growing jewelry collection.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
Author: Nono
Title: Attractive, functional jewelry box
Body: If you're looking for an attractive, understated, modern look in a jewelry box, this is a good one.Even though the product says "for women," I think it's great for anyone. Because of its gray color and modern look, it fits both feminine and masculine décor.The organization is very functional as well. The top drawer is visible through a glass window and accommodates rings and bracelets. The middle drawer is designed for necklaces, and the bottom drawer is open for flexible use. You can also remove and switch the organizing components if you don't want to use them or want to change how it's laid out.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2024

Title: Not white
Body: This is most definitely beige and not white. It is made out of pleather - not wood.

Author: Mr. August
Title: Perfect for Top of Dressers or Chests
Body: This is a small to intermediate size jewelry box that I found ideal if you do not need a large chest for rings, necklaces and earrings.  It can be used for the jewelry you wear most often.  The box is smartly designed into three drawers.  The highest drawer has a glass top allowing a quick visual look for most-used or smaller pieces.  The other two drawers are sectioned for bracelet, earrings and shorter necklaces.  Very reasonably priced.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2024
Author: Anne M
Title: Very pale pink!
Body: This is a super cute very pale pink jewelry box. The outside is made of a light leather and the inside is a velvet lining. It does have 4 drawers and you can use it for rings, necklaces, bracelets, earrings and he bottom drawer you could use for watches. It is very durable and made quite well. I bought this for my 8 year old daughter who is accumulating a lot of jewelry.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
Author: Peartree
Title: Well received as a gift
Body: I got this jewlery box as a gift for my wife who wanted a bigger storage space for her jewelry.  She likes it. I was surprised at how solid it is and heavier than expected. I'm not sure what I think of the window. I wonder if it would attract attention should thieves arrive. I like the velvety interior. The dividers are removable if needed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2024
Author: Globetrotter
Title: Perfect for College kids
Body: I bought this for my niece who will got to college next year, she loved AND her older sister asked me for the exact same one.  A total hit.  I have a bigger version of this but it would not be as suitable for a dorm's limited space :-)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2024
Author: Mia Pope
Title: Super cute! Lots of space for jewelry
Body: I love it! It's super cute. Fits all my jewelry with some extra space. Good value for the money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2024
Author: Clay Birdyshaw
Title: No complaints
Body: I got this jewelry box for my 6 year old daughter about 3 months ago. She absolutely loves it and uses it everyday. It must be made pretty well because she is constantly opening and closing it and digging through it and it has not gotten torn up.The dividers are pretty nice. It holds rings perfectly. There is not really anything built into it to keep necklaces from getting tangled up though, so you may need to be a little careful with how you place them in there. I have had to untangle a few, but I think that stemmed from my daughter putting more than 1 in each divider.Overall as a man who knows nothing about jewelry boxes I am pleased with it. My daughter loves it and it gets plenty of use and I don't see as many necklaces laying everywhere around the house. That is enough for it to get 5 stars from me.,

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2024
Author: Some Guy
Title: Must have jewelry box
Body: This jewelry box is great! There is plenty of space for my rings, earring bracelets, necklaces and Apple Watch bands. I was looking for a jewelry box smaller than what I currently have and this one is exactly what I was looking for. I highly recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2024
Author: Cassie Gainey
Title: Gorgeous 4-Layer Jewelry Box with a Glass Lid
Body: I am enamored with this four-layer jewelry box. It holds and showcases all my precious jewelry. It's great for travel and is really sturdy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Author: Jennifer C.
Title: Holds so much jewelry, looks beautiful and will hopefully last for years.
Body: This jewelry box has 2 drawers and another section under the glass lid with different storage configurations for storing your favorite pieces.It is really quite attractive and could have been a more perfect accompaniment to the other items I've pair with it if I would've had it custom made. I also have a gold and white marble jewelry box (being used for facial wipes) and the look so nice together!Get this for yourself and for a friend who will appreciate it! Oh! It comes with a nice card in case you do decide to gift one.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
Author: Amanda Swindle
Title: Good value
Body: Good value for the item, nice size and lots of space. I love how elegant and simple this little box looks sitting on the dresser. It isn't huge and bulky, but still has plenty of spots to store jewelry. I got it for a 7yr old that has lots of cosmetic jewelry and it works quite well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
Author: David I. Williams
Title: Very nice
Body: This is a well made and attractive jewelry box. It is very sturdy and solid. It's not made from cheap materials. It has three drawers with lots of dividers that can be moved around to fit your needs. The drawers are lined with a  soft felt surface that won't scratch your jewelry. It keeps everything organized and easy to find.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
Author: Ileana.G
Title: Absolutely stunning
Body: Wow, I absolutely loved it! It's even more beautiful in person than I had hoped for. Perfect size, exactly what I was looking for.  Would be a great gift for anyone. I HIGHLY recommend this.
